subject: How to write test cases for private methods using Junit
msgSnippet: Hi, I am new to this group. I would like to know if I can write junit tests for private methods. Regards, Anila [Non-text portions of this message have been
messageBody:
Hi,



I am new to this group. I would like to know if I can write junit
tests for private methods.



Regards,
